name: Google Ads Analysis
options: Number of scrolls to perform on the ad list
special_instructions: At least one Google Ads Transparency Center URL must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
The number of scrolls to perform on the ad list determines how many ads will be scraped. If not provided, the default number of scrolls will be performed
The output will include details such as advertiser name, advertiser ID, ad ID, ad as image, ad as text, ad as HTML, ad shown countries, ad last shown date, and ad impressions (if available)
The results can be downloaded in JSON, XML, or CSV format or connected to your backend via API

The output is stored in the default dataset associated with the actor, with each item representing an ad and containing information such as ID, advertiser name, last shown date, format, image, shown countries, advertiser ID, creative ID, text content, HTML content, and copy
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
